message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $750000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still feel that the product should be within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $850000.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to counter with an offer of $860000.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $880000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $870000.
I'm getting close to the end of my negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $885000. This is my last offer.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $875000.
